page.title: 03RECREATION - RAFFORD AREA
page.content: In our area there are very few facilities for recreations outside the home.The favourite recreation inside the home is watching television.Computer games are quite popular too.The least favourite recreations inside are playing cards drawing and beer making.A lady named Miss Bruce gives ballet lessons for girls.Outside the home the favourite recreations are gardening and cycling.Sport is an enjoyable recreation.The favourite sports throughout Rafford are hillwalking and swimming.Other sports enjoyed are horse_riding, snooker and badminton.Sports least enjoyed are golf and darts.There is only one football ground in Rafford.Books most often read are mysteries and historical fiction.
